resources.string:
An ordered broadcast is similar to a normal broadcast, except it delivers to receivers with a higher priority first. Those receivers, if they choose, can abort the broadcast to prevent lower priority receivers from catching them.
\n\nThis app demonstrate this functionality by showing a toast if the application is in the foreground, and showing a status bar notification if it is in the background. Go ahead, try it out! Press \"Start broadcasts\" to get started!
